import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; function Dashboard() { const [orders, setOrders] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/orders/', { withCredentials: true }) .then(res => setOrders(res.data)) .catch(() => alert('Failed to load orders')); }, []); return (
